summary: Provides utilities to parse iMOD point files (IDF) into pandas DataFrames and to serialize DataFrames back to the iMOD point file format, handling delimiters, data types, and associated files.
business_intent: Facilitates the integration of iMOD point data with Python data analysis workflows, allowing modelers and researchers to import, manipulate, and export observation point datasets for groundwater modeling and related studies.
